item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

rather than debunk it myself I’m just going to link to a reddit post I saw earlier, all the points made in the reddit post can be independently verified which is more than what can be said for the video

reddit

This Sandy hook conspiracy video has been making the FB rounds. Anyone want to...

654 points and 1103 comments so far on reddit

as for the laughing father: my mother has a nervous laugh and she acted almost identically at the funeral for her mother, emotions are not black and white and nobody deals with grief the same way
